Description: Finger-ring comprising a green glazed (worn) steatite scarab (elytra marked, humeral callosities present, feathered legs, pierced longitudinally, base inscribed with a representation of an enthroned king with prenomen of Ramses 2 (?) and epithets before) mounted in gold and joined to a gold hoop.
Acquisition name: Bequeathed by: Sir Augustus Wollaston Franks
